typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Emp_No } as integer,
		{Emp Name } as string,
		{Department } as string,
		City as string,
		LastUpdated_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empinblbstrg
source(output(
		Emp_No as integer,
		Emp_Name as string,
		Department as string,
		City as string,
		LastUpdated_Date as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> reftable
empinblbstrg, reftable exists({Emp_No } == Emp_No,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
